title: Rust Detection and Classification
one_line_description: Enhancing the BMT Survey Team by training a Convolutional Neural Network to automatically detect and classify corrosion in ship survey images.
details: This is a project that I took from a small moon-shot idea into a fully-fledged product that we're beginning to roll out internally.

I developed the machine learning pipeline myself. Starting with a blank jupyter notebook and ending with a fully-containerised API with automatic image logging for continuous retraining and improvement.
To demo the model and show-off its potential, I built a small web app in ReactJS that allows users to take a photo and send it to the API to return a classification.
I have since produced a full project scoping outline and secured funding to begin writing a cloud-based API and database solution.
responsibilities_preamble: For this project, I was responsible for essentially everything since it started as a research project.
